description: Restore the existing rubble mound breakwater located in Sandford, Nova Scotia.

# EB144-241513 Solicitation for West Breakwater Repairs in Sandford, Nova Scotia

## Solicitation Details
- **Contract Title**: West Breakwater Repairs, Sandford, Nova Scotia
- **Reference Number**: WS4337915718-Doc4338031597
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4337915718
- **Publication Date**: 04-Dec-2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: 19-Dec-2023 14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start and End Dates**: N/A
- **Tender Status**: Expired

## Solicitation Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans, invites contractors to tender for the modification to the existing rubblemound breakwater in Sandford, Nova Scotia. The project involves furnishing of all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and material to complete the work. The estimated value for this project is between $1,000,001 and $5,000,000. Delivery is expected within 12 weeks after contract award. 

## Suppliers Pre-Qualification
Bidders will be expected to submit a bid during Phase Two, along with a Bid Security. 

## Contact Information
* **Contracting Authority**: Adam Beaumaster, Travaux publics et services gouvernementaux (TPSGC)/Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)
* **Contact Email**: adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18183335?extsite=MTgxODMzMzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Contract Requirements
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Geographic Location**: Nova Scotia, Canada
* **UNSPSC Codes**: 72141200 (Marine construction services)
* **Contract Value Range**: $1,000,001 to $5,000,000. 

Note: I have made revisions to better represent the original certificate as a formal document and more closely adhere to the normal patterns found in such documents.
